isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - ENGINE COVER and cup holder

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cup Holder and Ashtray on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 125 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If so equipped, remove cup holder and ashtray (Item 4) as follows.

Using a flat blade screw driver, carefully slide it between the center dash panel (Item 1) and center dash panel trim bezel (Item 2). Carefully pry the center dash panel trim bezel out of the center dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

Remove two torx head screws (Item 3) from the front of center dash panel (Item 1) and slide cup holder and ashtray (Item 4) rearward to unhook cup holder and ashtray from underneath center dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

svcsubproc.title: Remove One Piece Engine Cover on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400 and 7500 Models

step1.para:
Remove passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat, fixed passenger bench seat without tool box or fixed passenger bench seat with tool box, refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing two man fixed bench seat without tool box, refer to Remove Two Man Fixed Bench Seat without Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing two man fixed bench seat with tool box, refer to Remove Two Man Fixed Bench Seat with Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 126 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 1) at the top of the engine cover (Item 2). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull driver side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the engine cover (Item 2). Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 3) from driver side of the engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull floor mat back away from bottom edge across the front of the engine cover (Item 2). Remove three hex flanged bolt (Item 4) from the engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull passenger side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the engine cover (Item 2). Remove hex flanged bolts (Item 5) from passenger side of the engine cover. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.
Slide engine cover (Item 2) out from under the dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 126. One Piece Engine Cover on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400 and 7500 Models

svcsubproc.title: Remove Two Piece Engine Cover on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for 7600 Model, Standard Cab for 7700 Model and Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 127 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If so equipped, remove rubberized cover from the engine cover.

Pull driver side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the front engine cover (Item 1). Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 2) from driver side of the front engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull passenger side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the front engine cover (Item 1). Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 3) from passenger side of the front engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Slide front engine cover (Item 1) out from under the dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 4) at the top of the rear engine cover (Item 5). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull driver side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the engine cover (Item 5). Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 6) from driver side of the engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Pull passenger side floor mat back away from bottom edge of the rear engine cover (Item 5). Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 7) from passenger side of the engine cover. Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Slide rear engine cover (Item 5) out from under the dash panel. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 127. Two Piece Engine Cover on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for 7600 Model, Standard Cab for 7700 Model and Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model
